title: InconsistentPayloadReconstructed error message appearing frequently in logs, unsure of cause
body:
## Description

Unknown error message appearing frequently in logs. Seems possibly harmless because not affecting validator status. But unable to find any results googling, and unsure of severity or implications.

## Version

4.4.1 - (installled with homebrew)
along with Erigon 2.49.1-stable

## Present Behaviour

After upgrading from 4.3.0, now frequently (seems like once every 5-15 seconds on average) seeing the following in the log for `lighthouse bn`:

```
Sep 17 00:14:14.006 ERRO Error fetching block for peer           error: InconsistentPayloadReconstructed { slot: Slot(5250209),
exec_block_hash: 0x781d2689ccba2d6835d543488f5d2d9d8bb7b80372645bb8206f2a95e5776246,
canonical_transactions_root: 0x29a0510021003b772986a38978f859463f4c1e469678412d15cbfe4dec5d9f49,
reconstructed_transactions_root: 0xc74c20d16c0966526aaecdcc39de8beab7da76ff03049fc432eddd0a652081fb },
block_root: 0x617353a6954e3c063d1306e0a73d17d8b946dfc0a2a174219b4551ba52cc34c9
```

## Expected Behaviour

Have never seen this before in previous versions. Would expect for it not to appear.

## Steps to resolve

?

@nateq314 As always, I'm going to ask for more logs if you can; however, this is my current hypothesis:

 1. https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/network/src/network_beacon_processor/rpc_methods.rs#L419-L424
 2. https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/beacon_chain/src/beacon_chain.rs#L1038-L1039
 3. https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/beacon_chain/src/beacon_block_streamer.rs#L658
 4. https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/beacon_chain/src/beacon_block_streamer.rs#L638
 5. https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/beacon_chain/src/beacon_block_streamer.rs#L561
 6. https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/beacon_chain/src/beacon_chain.rs#L1092-L1097

Note that these `debug!` log emissions immediately prior to the (conjectured) error origin might be helpful:

https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/2841f60686d642fcc0785c884d43e34e47a800dc/beacon_node/beacon_chain/src/beacon_chain.rs#L1084-L1090
This is probably an Erigon bug
Severity is mild: these payloads are only required to serve to peers. No risk to consensus or the node's ability to validate.

Thanks @jmcph4 for taking a look. Re-ran with output level set to debug and here's a representative snippet that includes some of what I was reporting:

```
Sep 17 10:55:54.931 DEBG Received Status Request                 fork_digest: [187, 164, 218, 150], finalized_epoch: 229485, finalized_root: 0xd425…b237, head_slot: 7343584, head_root: 0xe197…08a3, peer_id: 16Uiu2HAmRQQnumf2mD7ZY6J9N2xf5rExFeqJWerQmhg7W1i7zxV5, service: router
```
